name: BEE WAR
description:
• Strory
    Bee history 20XX...
    The bee kingdom is attacked by insects.
    Not only the honey bees, but the queen bee also fought, but this was in vain, and they were defeated.
    The bee kingdom attacked by the insects was under dominance for many years after that, and they were continually defiled.
    With a life of sexual slavery and continued rape, also forced into manual labor as a worker bee…
    Bee years 20XX were the dark ages.
    However, one girl has stood up to recover the bee kingdom.
    The girl using a poisonous barb protruding from her arse as a weapon fights alone..
  • Game
    This is horizontally scrolling action.
    The plump heroine moves forward while taking items.
    By taking items, you can build up power quickly and then use your death blow.
    The level of difficulty for the action becomes more difficult in the second half.
    Use 7 types of attack, dash and jump etc. to form a strategy.
    (For those who are not keen on action, it is equipped with some hidden tricks)
    If you come into contact with the enemy, your lives go down.
    If you grab your opponent while her tits are out, you can rape her.
    In the street you are attacked by bees of the same group.
    Take keys on the various walls and move forward.
    As you progress in the stages, it gets more difficult but there is continuity
    (Where there is continuity, the item effects are also carried over, so it becomes easier the more continuity there is)
  • Sex
    The scenes where sex occurs during the action are in animation.
    The event scenes are also animated.
    (some of the scenes are not animated)
    There is a gallery mode to view the sex scenes.
    We have made it as practical as possible.
    !!All characters appearing are over 20 years old.!!
